@Craig__b Our flights are based on market demand. We're always considering adding more cities. Please check our website for the latest updates to our route maps and schedules. Here's the link: https://t.co/msWzoojfPF

DM us you have any other questions- we’re here for you. :)

urls.description: Find Ultra Low Cost Flights with Spirit Airlines ✈ 400+ Daily Routes to U.S.A., South America and the Carribean ✈ Save Big with our Bare Fare™ and $9 fare club

data.text: Save big and cross another destination off your list! Book a trip now with $49* fares one way. Book by 11/15 at 11:59 PM*: https://t.co/d2vz7vLOyu https://t.co/ZDAJhtCgXE
